post:
MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 24 Hours!


 
==================>>Current Inventory:

**MR1:**
C3558 (4c,4t)
32GB ECC RAM
1x 120 GB NVME
2x 4TB HDD (CMR)
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
=> **55 EURO per Month (65 USD)** - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1 "ORDER")

**MR3**
Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 4TB HDD (CMR), 7200 rpm
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
=> **70 EURO per Month  (82 USD)** - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=3 "ORDER")

**MR4**

=> **45 EURO per Month (52 USD)** - [ ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=6 " ORDER")



==================>>Addon Pricing:
 
General:
* IPv4 Addresses: +1x ipv4......+1.5 Euro/Month
* Upgrade to 10TB Transfer ......+10 Eur/Month

==================>>Payment Options:

* PayPal
* Stripe
* Go-Cardless *new*
* Wire-Transfer (via Transferwise, open a Support Ticket)

==================>>Legal/Misc Stuff:

Custom servers and hardware upgrades are are available!

Got any Questions or Requests? **Contact: support (at) myroot (dot) pw**
